sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_rest_message_fn"><sys_rest_message_fn action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><authentication_type>inherit_from_parent</authentication_type><basic_auth_password/><basic_auth_profile/><basic_auth_user/><content>{
  "input": {"text": "${text}"},
  "context": ${context}
}</content><function_name>Assistant</function_name><http_method>post</http_method><lock>false</lock><oauth2_profile/><protocol_name/><qualified_name>IBM Watson Assistant [ Assistant ]</qualified_name><rest_endpoint>https://gateway-wdc.watsonplatform.net/assistant/api</rest_endpoint><rest_message display_value="IBM Watson Assistant">67d834fcdbecff0057a7f03d0f961946</rest_message><sys_class_name>sys_rest_message_fn</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>steven.gregory</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-29 23:52:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>30bf3c34db20334057a7f03d0f9619a8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Assistant</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_rest_message_fn_30bf3c34db20334057a7f03d0f9619a8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>steven.gregory</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-29 23:53:32</sys_updated_on><use_basic_auth>false</use_basic_auth><use_mid_server/><use_mutual_auth>false</use_mutual_auth></sys_rest_message_fn></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_6a20f478dbecff0057a7f03d0f9619bd
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.WatsonService</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>WatsonService</name><script><![CDATA[var WatsonService = Class.create();
WatsonService.prototype = {
  initialize: function() {},
  getLanguage: function(input) {
    var r = this.doRestMsg('IBM Watson Identify Language', 'Identify');
    r.setStringParameterNoEscape('text', input);
    var response = r.execute();
    var responseBody = response.getBody();
    var result = JSON.parse(responseBody);
    return result.languages[0].language;
  },
  isEnglish: function(language) {
    return language === 'en' ? true : false;
  },
  doRestMsg: function(name, method) {
    return new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2(name, method);
  },
  translate: function(input, model) {
    var r = this.doRestMsg('IBM Watson Language Translator', 'Translate');
    r.setStringParameterNoEscape('text', input);
    r.setStringParameterNoEscape('model_id', model);
    var response = r.execute();
    var responseBody = response.getBody();
    var result = JSON.parse(responseBody);
    return result.translations[0].translation;
  },
  type: 'WatsonService'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>steven.gregory</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-29 22:45:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>6a20f478dbecff0057a7f03d0f9619bd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>WatsonService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6a20f478dbecff0057a7f03d0f9619bd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>steven.gregory</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-29 23:59:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_cb_topic_cadee438dbecff0057a7f03d0f9619a2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_cb_topic"><sys_cb_topic action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><applicability/><connect_queue/><description>An IBM Watson integration experiment looking at two AI services: the Language Translator and Watson Assistant.</description><graph>{
  "graph_api_version": "1.0.3",
  "goals": {
    "3f9e821a80d74129ba58144f35d29c16": {
      "id": "3f9e821a80d74129ba58144f35d29c16",
      "trigger": {
        "type": "primary"
      },
      "name": "primary",
      "applicability": "",
      "description": "",
      "nodes": {
        "12620845d4af406a88a824a6861c6a9e": {
          "id": "12620845d4af406a88a824a6861c6a9e",
          "stepType": "Start",
          "name": "Start",
          "greetingResponse": {
            "mode": "simple",
            "value": ""
          }
        },
        "e541d0d4e644424d818f0334ed25874b": {
          "id": "e541d0d4e644424d818f0334ed25874b",
          "stepType": "TerminateGoal",
          "name": "End",
          "confirmationMessage": {
            "mode": "simple",
            "value": ""
          }
        },
        "2e0e2d322eab44c5abe246c91f29274f": {
          "id": "2e0e2d322eab44c5abe246c91f29274f",
          "stepType": "Prompt",
          "name": "Greeting",
          "prompt": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n  return 'Hello ' + vaVars.first_name + ', how can I help you?';\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "confirmMessage": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "acknowledgeMsg": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": "",
          "optional": false,
          "defaultValue": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "variableId": "caf28346a47d459b945fbd33982b09b4"
        },
        "b1f49c7e213b433bbab0a1f48414ad64": {
          "id": "b1f49c7e213b433bbab0a1f48414ad64",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Watson Identify Language",
          "value": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n  var watson = new WatsonService;\n  vaVars.language = watson.getLanguage(vaInputs.greeting);\n  vaVars.is_english = watson.isEnglish(vaVars.language);\n})();\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "applicability": ""
        },
        "2d95155c0aef4fb0ba940132e98364db": {
          "id": "2d95155c0aef4fb0ba940132e98364db",
          "stepType": "Decision",
          "name": "Decision"
        },
        "49677c260af64fa38b88a2c307bee1e5": {
          "id": "49677c260af64fa38b88a2c307bee1e5",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Transfer Message",
          "value": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n  return vaVars.english_transfer;\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "applicability": ""
        },
        "4d23e8398c074ffb8ea36bb8c5e2d0e9": {
          "id": "4d23e8398c074ffb8ea36bb8c5e2d0e9",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Watson Translate",
          "value": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n  var watson = new WatsonService;\n  var modelId = 'en' + '-' + vaVars.language;\n  return watson.translate(vaVars.transfer_msg, modelId);\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "applicability": ""
        },
        "fe3f0320fee54cf5a67b11a0e076d46b": {
          "id": "fe3f0320fee54cf5a67b11a0e076d46b",
          "stepType": "Prompt",
          "name": "Talk",
          "prompt": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n  return vaVars.watson_response;\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "confirmMessage": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "acknowledgeMsg": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": "",
          "optional": false,
          "defaultValue": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "variableId": "b629bd3f8b4649f68b418a7c8ccdaf40"
        },
        "c9cf6d2faa084609901ebbd6ef8ec5cf": {
          "id": "c9cf6d2faa084609901ebbd6ef8ec5cf",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Watson Assistant",
          "value": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n  var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('IBM Watson Assistant', 'Assistant');\n  r.setStringParameterNoEscape('text', vaInputs.talk);\n  r.setStringParameterNoEscape('context', vaVars.watson_context);\n  var response = r.execute();\n  var responseBody = response.getBody();\n  var result = JSON.parse(responseBody);\n  var responseLength = result.output.generic.length;\n  var text = '';\n  for (var i = 0; i < responseLength; i++) {\n    text = text + ' ' + result.output.generic[i].text;\n  }\n  vaVars.watson_response = text;\n  vaVars.watson_context = JSON.stringify(result.context);\n  vaVars.watson_intent = result.intents[0].intent;\n})();",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "applicability": ""
        },
        "7321bc5f9d80489a8c0f2533c5138ed6": {
          "id": "7321bc5f9d80489a8c0f2533c5138ed6",
          "stepType": "Decision",
          "name": "Decision"
        },
        "bb574edc6605462f8b65991724e5c3d5": {
          "id": "bb574edc6605462f8b65991724e5c3d5",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Watson End",
          "value": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n  return vaVars.watson_response;\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "applicability": ""
        }
      },
      "edges": [

          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": "",
          "expression": "(function execute() {\n  return vaVars.is_english == true;\n})()\n",
          "label": "Is English"
        },
        {
          "id": "14b50ffaf186471795584362763079fe",

          "target": "4d23e8398c074ffb8ea36bb8c5e2d0e9",
          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": "",
          "expression": "(function execute() {\n    return vaVars.is_english != true;\n})()\n",
          "label": "Not English"
        },
        {

        },

          "edgeType": "Branch",

          "target": "fe3f0320fee54cf5a67b11a0e076d46b",
          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": "",
          "expression": "(function execute() {\n  return vaVars.watson_intent != 'Goodbye';\n})()",
          "label": "Keep Asking"
        },

        },

  },
  "variables": {

    },

      "id": "1a103b2a43d0437a82b375f7f2e8f57b",
      "value": {
        "mode": "script",
        "value": "(function execute() {\n  return gs.getUser().getFirstName();\n})()\n"
      },

      "label": "first_name",

    },

    },
    "a88fde9f294a4542834aa1625faff093": {

      "value": {
        "mode": "simple",

      "label": "is_english",

    },
    "655826104ed440559ad3ce406c38af6f": {
      "id": "655826104ed440559ad3ce406c38af6f",
      "value": {
        "mode": "simple",
        "value": "We detected English isn't your primary language being used, we will kindly forward to you representative who can assist you."
      },
      "name": "transfer_msg",
      "label": "transfer_msg",
      "varType": "script"
    },

      "value": {
        "mode": "simple",
        "value": "One moment, while we transfer you to our booking assistant."
      },

      "label": "english_transfer",
      "varType": "script"
    },
    "b629bd3f8b4649f68b418a7c8ccdaf40": {

    },

      "value": {
        "mode": "simple",
        "value": ""
      },

    },
    "41dd8106b34b490cb11623308eb355b7": {

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_rest_message_fn"><sys_rest_message_fn action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><authentication_type>inherit_from_parent</authentication_type><basic_auth_password/><basic_auth_profile/><basic_auth_user>steven.gregory</basic_auth_user><content>{
